author: cbs8
title: What's Your Moji Mood?!
text:
Little Kids Inc.
Collectible Characters that Express their Mood through Sound!
SEEKONK, Mass. , Oct. 26, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Make your Mondays memorable with Moji Mood Mondays!
Moji-Mis are "living emoticons" in the form of cute, little characters that love to jibber jabber and express their feelings and personalities through sound. Tickle each Moji's hair to hear its silly sounds – no two Mojis sound alike!
Mojis have their own silly language and love to chat with you – and each other – all day long. Just tickle their hair to get the conversation going, or cross the hairs of two Mojis together and they will talk to each other. Just like you, Mojis express their feelings through unique sounds, all of which they communicate in their own fun way. Sounds include happy, frazzled, grumpy, silly, startled and more. When Moji Mis are bored they fall asleep and start to snore, but pick them up and they'll wake and start chatting again.
Moji fans are invited to meet a new Moji every Monday, now through Christmas. Little Kids Inc. will release a stop animation video across all of their Moji Mi social media platforms each week, and each video will introduce a different Moji and describe their Moji mood!
Fans can share their own Moji Moods, using videos, pictures and more during the Moji Mood Monday holiday campaign using #mojimood.
Today's #mojimood video features the new Feelin' Double Dog Daring Moji Mi; this moji is smooth, he's suave, he's definitely cocky - and he may or may not be Norweigian. He's guarenteed to be the coolest Moji in the room – let's face it, you'll want to be him.
There's a Moji for every emotion – so tell us, What's your Moji Mood ?!
Follow Moji Mi on Instagram (my_moji_mi), Facebook (Moji-Mi), and Twitter (my_moji_mi).
Moji Mis recently appeared in The Toy Insiders Top 2015 Holiday Toy Guide ( http://www.thetoyinsider.com/toys/moji-mi/ ) and are designed for kids 6 & up. Mojis retail for $5.99-$6.99 and are available at specialty toy stores, Target, Toys R Us, K-Mart, and Fred Meyer . For more information about Moji-Mi, visit us at www.moji-mi.com .
PR Contacts:
Joyce Reid , VP Marketing
jreid@littlekidsinc.com
Keri Castro , Brand Manager
kcastro@littlekidsinc.com
Toy industry leader, Jim Engle founded Little Kids® Inc. in 1989. LKI develops, manufactures and markets innovative and award-winning bubble, sports, novelty and activity toys that promote creative play. LKI is privately owned enterprise headquartered in Seekonk , MA.
